issue.title: duckdns.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://duckdns.org](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fduckdns.org) ### Comment > **.duckdns.org itself is a legit DDNS service and should not be flagged as unsafe. the subsites (https://somesite.duckdns.org) may be unsafe, but the website as whole is okay. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/rspfaw97qdc440c844kcwogcg4ko008gx06u9qvzrs.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/1oj9z5y883xckc0wows4sc040sgwocw7avybbrrz00.png?nc=1)

comment.body:
> may be unsafe,

We'd be able to switch to specific block if someone can continuously provide a complete list of these hundreds of malicious domain changing everyday:
```
https://www.dropbox.com/s/qtxp4xsj3h6glwi/20230627DL_199_19_95_72.txt
https://www.dropbox.com/s/bqjmjnrbo7ya0zm/20230601PH_103_114_217_10.txt
```
We told those who actually need duckdns how to disable the rule, not to mention they can still access the site with single click.

comment.body: @Alex-302 Blocked adserver in EL and locked down, but IMO regex is needed for this: `https://qejb.qqvvkebebvly.top/kbwavzqankkvv/jjvvbw`: `/^https:\/\/[a-z]{3,5}\.[a-z]{10,14}\.top\/[a-z]{10,16}\/[a-z]{5,6}$/$script,3p,match-case`

issue.title: Google Play: jp.newsdigest
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.newsdigest](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fplay.google.com%2Fstore%2Fapps%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Djp.newsdigest) ### Comment > v3.6までは多くのアプリの広告が消えていましたが、4.0になってからは、今回報告したNewsDigestを初めとする多くのアプリの広告が消えなくなりました。とても困っています。v3.6に戻した方がいいのでしょうか。 ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/6dia4ouaofc4cggkw8c8skw84cg4w0c6ys6b32kw14.jpg?nc=1)
